title: About me
text: I’m also a daddy - with husband, G - to two insanely brilliant but completely exhausting adopted children aged six (Child 1) and three (Child 2).

title: Hello world.
text:
To find out more, click on ‘About me’ at the top of the page. If you are interested in my witterings about psychology, academia, parenthood and other marginalia, take a look at my Blog.
On this page, you’ll also find links to my CV and social media. To contact me, click the wizzy Email button below.
I built this website on Quarto. To learn more about Quarto websites visit https://quarto.org/docs/websites.
